Text:
Well, LeKirtap, you have a few people interested - and it sounds like fun, but we'll never know, unless YOU seed first!  We're not going to be able to help unless you go on line and actually UP the torrent FIRST - then we can take over and make your torrent a success.  

We're waiting. . . .  for YOU!

I'm sorry about that. Something seems to be wrong. This is my second upload so please have some indulgence. I did a test upload (https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8334149/Friend_Of_A_Friend_Vol._01) which downloads without problems. I don't know what went wrong but I'm going to look into it asap. I wont be home for 24 hours+ though (I'm on a different computer now) but I'll see if I can fix whatever went wrong or try to reupload. Thanks for commenting and sorry for the inconvenience. I don't want to waste anyones time and I to hate it when people upload and don't seed.

Thank You for commenting. I'm sorry but something seems to be wrong. This is my first couple of uploads so please bear with me. I did a testupload (https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8334149/Friend_Of_A_Friend_Vol._01) which seemed to download fine but actually stalls at 99,9%. I don't have access to my computer at the moment since I'm not at home for another 24 hours. Maybe it has restarted or something. I will look into it asap. If I can't get this torrent to work I will reupload.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
OK, I won't declare it dead just yet.  I'll give you all the time you need.  Good luck, I know you'll figure it out.

Well, we're up to 81%.  That's something.  But it's taken about a week to do it.  But there's still people waiting.

Dead?  Maybe. . . .
Thank you, thank you, thank you!  Everyone pulled together and *we* did it!
